summary: In a dark future where the Androids have taken over Earth, Gohan and his student Trunks are the last defense against these deadly killing machines.
cast: Masako Nozawa|Mayumi Tanaka|Hiromi Tsuru|Ryô Horikawa|Takeshi Kusao|Naoko Watanabe|Daisuke Gôri|Naoki Tatsuta|Kôhei Miyauchi|Shigeru Nakahara|Miki Itô|Shinobu Satouchi|Shin'ichirô Ôta|Nao Nagasawa|Kazunari Tanaka|Jôji Yanami|Monika Antonelli|Mark Britten|John Burgmeier|Dameon Clarke|Cynthia Cranz|Chuck Huber|Bradford Jackson|Dale Kelly|Meredith McCoy|Mike McFarland|Stephanie Nadolny|Christopher Sabat|Sean Schemmel|Eric Vale|Tiffany Vollmer
title: Dragon Ball Z: Un futuro diferente - Gohan y Trunks
